title: [CLIENT] wrong picture shown for Darkforge Jarvan IV skin in hextech crafting
body:
[](http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m181/Backflip__2002/wrong%20skin%20picture_zpszlpimj4w.png)

I was looking at what I got from hextech today and noticed that the picture is for the Dragon Slayer Jarvan IV skin and the text when you hover over it is for the Darkforge Jarvan IV skin.

replies.body:
Hey PlatypusSurprise! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here. :)
